image.title: Concert Flyer
image.caption: Promotional Poster for the JD Souther Benefit Concert that PennellChing Development is producing for the Texas Heritage League. Sam Houston IV, the great grandson of General Sam Houston will be guest hosting the event. We will be celebrating the completion of the 3 hour documentary film on the life of Sam Houston that was just done by the Texas Heritage League and raising money for the ongoing work of the organization.
